WorkItem.ClosedComment: This is a duplicate of Issue #3783 - Allow Matching on Default Namespace Without Explicit Prefix.  The current workaround is to not use default namespaces, or add a prefix to the namespace (change xmlns="http://...   to xmlns:anything="http://...).  Sorry for the inconvenience.  I'll get this fixed when I get a chance.
